post.content:
Stewart criminal probe call 'We are at end of the road': To query if her accounts were 'false, misleading' Peter Morton - Financial Post Wednesday, September 11, 2002
...The committee, frustrated by Ms. Stewart's refusal to explain the sale of almost 4,000 ImClone Systems Inc. shares a day before the share price plummeted, asked Justice to determine whether Ms. Stewart lied to Congress...
유명인사 Stewart여사가 부당한 주식매도로 구설수에 오르고 있습니다. 자기의 ImCline Sytems inc주식을 판 후 주가가 수직하락(plummet)한 것이 이유인데요... plummet, 갑작스런 추락, 곤두박질침이란 의미죠.
야후사전은... plum·met － n. 1 낚싯봉; 다림추; 다림줄(plumb line); 다림먹줄(plumb rule). 2 무거운 짐, 중압물. －v.i. 수직으로 떨어지다[뛰어들다]<down> 갑자기 내려가다. ㆍ The airplane ∼ed to the sea. 비행기는 바다에 곤두박질쳤다.
Cambridge Dictionary는 plummet - verb [I] to fall very quickly and suddenly [예문] House prices have plummeted in recent months. A recently published report suggests that national levels of literacy have plummeted. The aircraft's engine failed and it plummeted from/out of the sky. Several large rocks were sent plummeting down the mountain. The child fell from the top of the slide and plummeted to/towards the ground.
m-w dictionary는 1 : to fall perpendicularly <birds plummeted down> 2 : to drop sharply and abruptly <prices plummeted>
